title: Bug 101187 - Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187 - When trying to add a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a localization key without entering any value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart when expected.
EB: The system should display the externalized text in the chart even if the localization key is blank.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the chart settings.
2. Leave the localization key field empty.
3. Save the settings and observe the chart to see that the externalized text is not displayed correctly.
